T02D3442:101a-1: a'arya w'a g'i r'a dza manydzu shr'i s'a dha nam /
T02D3442:101a-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal ngag gi rgyal po'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3442:101a-5: gur gum bzang po ltar dmar gzhon nu'i sku la dpal gyis mtshan //
T02D3442:101a-6: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyis rmongs pa'i dra ba bcom pa bzhin //
T02D3442:101a-7: dbang phyug yongs bcings phyag gis dam chos 'chad pa'i tshul mdzad pa//
T02D3442:101a-8: rol pa'i stabs bzhugs 'dod sbyin ngag gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal //
T02D3442:101a-9: snga bar langs te dang por ni //
T02D3442:101a-10: pam las snying gar sna tshogs pad //
T02D3442:101a-11: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng //
T02D3442:101a-12: hr'i:yig gur gum lta bur dmar //
T02D3442:101a-13: bltas nas zhal bsang la sogs bya //
T02D3442:101b-0: bsam gtan khang pa gtsang ma @101b ru ;
T02D3442:101b-1: / bde ba'i stan la yang dag gnas //
T02D3442:101b-2: sngags dang sangs rgyas yon tan gnas //
T02D3442:101b-3: byams pas 'gro la bu sdug bzhin //
T02D3442:101b-4: dga' bas yon tan stong ldan ltar //
T02D3442:101b-5: sdug bsngal rgyur gyur sdug bsngal las //
T02D3442:101b-6: gdon par 'dod pa'i snying rje yis //
T02D3442:101b-7: rtag tu rab dga' de bzhin du //
T02D3442:101b-8: yon tan dam pa rab sbyor 'dod //
T02D3442:101b-9: rang gi don la mi lta bar //
T02D3442:101b-10: btang snyoms gzhan gyi don byed pa //
T02D3442:101b-11: sngags pas bsgom bya 'od zer tshogs //
T02D3442:101b-12: spros nas rgyal rnams gdan drangs te //
T02D3442:101b-13: de yis nam mkha' gang bar blta //
T02D3442:101b-14: yid kyi rang bzhin las byung mchod //
T02D3442:101b-15: byug pa dril phyis khrus rnams dang //
T02D3442:101b-16: sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan par bya //
T02D3442:101b-17: mchod pa'i sprin tshogs 'phro ba yi //
T02D3442:101b-18: khams gsum yang dag lha ru spro //
T02D3442:101b-19: yang na so so grangs med pa'i //
T02D3442:101b-20: lus sprul nas ni phyag bya'o //
T02D3442:101b-21: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang //
T02D3442:101b-22: rnam gsum lus ngag yid dbang gis //
T02D3442:101b-23: byas pa'i sdig dang byed pa la ;
T02D3442:101b-24: / rjes su yi rang de rnams bshags //
T02D3442:101b-25: sems can don byed dang bcas pa'i //
T02D3442:101b-26: sdom pa yang nas yang du gzung //
T02D3442:101b-27: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jam dbyangs sogs //
T02D3442:101b-28: sbyin pa la sogs dge las skyes //
T02D3442:101b-29: yang dag rdzogs la gsol 'debs shing //
T02D3442:101b-30: yun ring dam ches gsung bar bskul ;
T02D3442:101b-31: / dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro zhing //
T02D3442:101b-32: byang chub sems kyi lam mchog bsten //
T02D3442:101b-33: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham //
T02D3442:101b-34: de nas sna tshogs padma gnas //
T02D3442:101b-35: aom yig las skyes zla steng gnas //
T02D3442:101b-36: yi ge'i tshogs 'phro blta byas nas //
T02D3442:101b-37: 'gro ba rnams la 'jam dbyangs mchog / dgug gzhug byas nas sngags pa yis //
T02D3442:101b-38: ngag gi rgyal po bsgom par bya //
T02D3442:101b-39: gur gum ltar dmar mdzes pa'i sku //
T02D3442:101b-40: sgyu ma 'dod lha las rgyal ba //
T02D3442:101b-41: ha ri ha ri'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02D3442:101b-42: 'khrul pa med pa rol pa'i stabs //
T02D3442:101b-43: phyag g-yon sdong bu dang bcas pa'i //
T02D3442:101b-44: autpal sngon po yongs su bsnams ;
T02D3442:101b-45: / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan tshogs //
T02D3442:101b-46: rin chen rgyan gyis rab mdzes pa //
T02D3442:101b-48: sangs rgyas tshogs kyi phreng ba blta //
T02D3442:101b-49: chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya che //
T02D3442:101b-50: phyag gi padma nges par sbyar //
T02D3442:102a-2: gzhan gyi mgon byed gdan drangs te //
T02D3442:102a-3: gzhal yas khang pa dang mtshungs par //
T02D3442:102a-4: de dag mtshungs nyid gdan drangs te //
T02D3442:102a-5: dam tshig rnam gsum brtan par bya //
T02D3442:102a-6: de nas yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D3442:102a-7: dgug gzhug dbang du bya ba rnams //
T02D3442:102a-8: aom badzra satva sa ma ya /
T02D3442:102a-13: aa ham dza:h'um bam ho: aom gyis sku byin gyis brlab /
T02D3442:102a-15: h'um gis thugs byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D3442:102a-17: yi ge'i tshogs kyis ye shes byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D3442:102a-18: 'od zer gyis yang dag par bskul nas /
T02D3442:102a-19: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku las 'thon te lha'i
T02D3442:102a-20: rnam par bkug nas bum pa'i ye shes kyi chu
T02D3442:102a-21: dang / rdo rje spyi bor sbyin par bya'o //
T02D3442:102a-22: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis mchod //
T02D3442:102a-23: sangs rgyas mchod pa'i dpung gnyen gyis //
T02D3442:102a-24: slar yang srid par 'byung ba yi //
T02D3442:102a-25: srid pa grub cing dag par 'gyur //
T02D3442:102a-26: slar yang bsgom bya las thob pa //
T02D3442:102a-27: lus dang sems ni shin tu sbyang //
T02D3442:102a-28: do shal phreng ba'i rim pa yis //
T02D3442:102a-29: de nas sngags bzlas yang dag brtsam //
T02D3442:102a-30: khams gsum ma lus pa yon tan gyi rgya mtshor byas nas gzhug pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02D3442:102a-31: rnam par bsgoms la aom a'a:h'um zhes pas bkug nas bzod par gsol bar bya'o //
T02D3442:102a-33: 'gro rnams de yi rang bzhin blta //
T02D3442:102a-34: gang dang gang sbyor las rnams la //
T02D3442:102a-35: sems can don la de bzhin dgod //
T02D3442:102a-36: dkon mchog gsum la rab dad pa'i //
T02D3442:102a-37: slob ma rnams kyis shes bya la //
T02D3442:102a-38: 'jig rten dngos grub nges pa ni //
T02D3442:102a-39: ngag gi rgyal po'i sgrub thabs yin //
T02D3442:102a-43: yi dam gyi lha thams cad nang du bsgoms nas /
T02D3442:102a-44: de'i mandal mdor bsdus pa brtsam par bya'o //
T02D3442:102a-45: aom hr'i:sv'a h'a zhes pa ni lag pa bkru ba dang /
T02D3442:102a-47: aom h'um stan byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so //
T02D3442:102a-49: sa yongs su gzung ba'i sngags so //
T02D3442:102a-50: aom sarba bighn'am nud s'a ra ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3442:102a-51: ba'i lci ba la sogs pa len pa'i sngags so //
T02D3442:102a-52: de nas legs par byugs nas /
T02D3442:102a-53: aom badzra re khe h'um zhes pa ni re khe
T02D3442:102a-54: h'um zhes pa ni re kha byin gyis brlab pa'i
T02D3442:102a-55: sngags so // yang me tog gcig mandal du phul nas /
T02D3442:102b-0: @102b aom su re khe sarba ta th'a ga t'a dhi tishthantu sv'a h'a /
T02D3442:102b-1: zhes brjod nas lag pa bkru bar bya'o //
T02D3442:102b-2: de'i rjes su me tog cig la bzlas nas /
T02D3442:102b-3: aom ma ni dha ri badzra ni ma h'a pra
T02D3442:102b-4: ti s'a rer ksha raksha m'am h'um phat sv'a h'a
T02D3442:102b-5: / zhes pas rang gi spyi bor me tog cig bzhag nas bdag nyid bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D3442:102b-6: yang aom a'a:h'um zhes pa ni bdag nyid bsrung ba'i sngags so //
T02D3442:102b-7: mandal de la sna tshogs padma'i gzugs su dmigs nas /
T02D3442:102b-9: de'i steng du gur gum ltar dmar ba'i bcom ldan
T02D3442:102b-10: 'das kyi sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis thog ma
T02D3442:102b-11: med pa nas yang dag par grub pa'i bcom ldan
T02D3442:102b-12: 'das rab tu 'bar ba gdan drangs te /
T02D3442:102b-13: rim pa bzhin du byon nas de la de bzhin
T02D3442:102b-14: du rab tu zhugs shing bcom ldan 'das bskyed nas
T02D3442:102b-15: / aom manydzu gho sh'a ya badzra pu shpe h'um aom aaksho bhya badzra pushpe h'um /
T02D3442:102b-16: aom badzra bee ro tsan'a ya badzra pu shpe h'um /
T02D3442:102b-23: t'a r'a rnams sngon ma bzhin du me tog dang /
T02D3442:102b-28: gos 'phyang ba la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs nas dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3442:102b-31: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba rnams byas nas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3442:102b-32: de nas gshegs pa ni aom badzra mu:zhes so //
T02D3442:102b-33: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'adya nutpanna tv'a ca aom a'a:h'um phat sv'ah'a /
T02D3442:102b-34: zhes pa ni 'byung po thams cad kyi sngags so //
T02D3442:102b-35: aom ha r'i tyee ma h'a yakshi ne ha re ha re /
T02D3442:102b-36: sarba p'a pa ni ma k'im sarba ya ksh'im ni pra be sha ni sv'a h'a /
T02D3442:102b-38: aom aa gra pin d'a shibhya:sv'a h'a /
T02D3442:102b-39: phud kyi chang bu'i sngags so //
T02D3442:102b-40: aom au tstshishta pind'a sha ne bhya:sv'ah'a /
T02D3442:102b-41: lhag ma'i chang bu'i sngags so //
T02D3442:102b-42: aom a'a:sarba ta th'a ga t'a bhi she ka sa
T02D3442:102b-43: ma ya shri ye h'um h'um zhes pa ni sku
T02D3442:102b-44: gzugs la sogs pa sku khrus gsol ba'i sngags so
